fields.headline: Hancock
fields.bodyText: Peter Berg's feel-good summer movie Hancock, stars Will Smith as the eponymous superhero who uses powers much like those of Superman to help the citizens of Los Angeles. The twist is that Hancock is a lazy, boozy slacker. While saving lives, he creates expensive chaos wherever his missions take him, making him a public menace. Depressed idealistic PR man Jason Bateman takes up his case on a pro bono basis with mildly amusing results. Then comes the second twist. Another superhero emerges and this for some reason has the effects of weakening Hancock's powers. It ends up a confused festival of sentimentality and special effects.
